text: Cape Town CBD is absolutely beautiful and vibrant! The street art is amazing and it's so walkable.
Visited Long Street last week. It's expensive but the nightlife is buzzing with energy.
Safety concerns in the city center. Felt unsafe walking around at night.
Greenmarket Square is charming and has great views of the Table Mountain. Highly recommend!
The CBD is clean and accessible. Very convenient location for tourists.
Dirty streets and boring shops. Not worth the hype.
Amazing restaurants and vibrant atmosphere! Cape Town CBD is fantastic for dining.
Be careful with your pockets. There are pickpockets around the CBD area.
Scenic views and beautiful architecture make this place really special.
Affordable prices and great service. Love the central location!
